document.full_text: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on monday the killing of a jewish settler couple and three of their children was "inhuman," telling israel he was determined to help catch those responsible.
document.title: settlement killings inhuman, abbas tells israel
lines_and_colors: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said on monday the killing of a jewish settler couple and three of their children was "inhuman," telling israel he was determined to help catch those responsible.
